title: Destiny Falls Team Tournaments!
body:
http://imageshack.com/a/img538/9964/xJoNty.jpg
Destiny Falls Riot Funded Tournament
All ranks welcome!
Time: 7:00 pm est
Date: Today!(11/7/2014)
5v5 Premade Team Tournament Solo Players Can Join
Server: NA
TS3: ts60.gamespeak.com:9266
Website: [Here](http://destinyfalls.org/)
To Register: [Register](https://destinyfalls.forums.net/register)
After you register just join the teamspeak at least 15 min before 7pm est or 4pm pst

Prizing: We are Funded by RIOT so with that prizing is listed as follows for all events types:
1st place: 3200 Riot Points
2nd place: 2400 Riot Points
3rd place: 1600 Riot
4th place: 800 Riot Points

replies.body: Not that we host. Go To the prized events page to search events to your taste
are there any tournaments that dont use teamspeak because teamspeak sucks
yeah if u already registered just show up 15 mins prior to the tournament
So if we are already registered for the forums we just have to show up?
